snippet: In a nationally televised speech, President Hassan Rouhani said: “America is our enemy; we have no doubt about this. The Americans want to put as much pressure on us as they can.”...
lead_paragraph: In a nationally televised speech, President Hassan Rouhani said: “America is our enemy; we have no doubt about this. The Americans want to put as much pressure on us as they can.”

headline.main: Iran’s President Says Donald Trump Can’t Tear Up Nuclear Pact
headline.print_headline: Iran’s Leader Says Trump Can’t Scrap  Nuclear Pact
